ygData.subject: Re: /camp desktop and trade skills
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Gotcha. I actually got it to work. Set it at 2. It s pretty cool although I haven t experimented much with it. I was too busy hunting for spiderlings and
ygData.messageBody:
1) Gotcha. I actually got it to work. Set it at
2. It's pretty cool although I haven't experimented
much with it. I was too busy hunting for spiderlings
and discovering that I should NEVER beg from
merchants. LOL.<br><br>2) Ppl have told me begging from
merchants was a bad idea. I found out why. LOL. Merchants
double attack (or maybe that was dual wield) and hit a
level 8 character for 48 a pop. Haven't gotten a raise
in beg skill in so long, I feel pathetic.
=)<br><br>3) Thanks Iskandar for the info about skills. I
found the Kelethin Racial forge (don't ask me to spell
that... lol) yesterday. Makes me wish I had 100 plat to
get smithing up that high. =) Oh well, heck... I'm
only level 9. I'm glad the things I'm reading on
Fletching are wrong. <br><br>It also means I can feel free
to fish all day long. Cooking a stack of fish with
wasp wings and bat wings is TOUGH to gain skill. I
have no idea why. I only get a point or two per stack
of 20. Almost tempted to sell
instead.<br><br>shooman out
